attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
all of the united kindom, and all over the world have a national day for where they live. so do england, but soon they will not. The council are trying to ban the parades on ST.George's day! They even ordered a shopkeeper to remove his flags, as they said it was breaking healh and safety rules!! 

WWe english have a right to celebrate ST.George's day. And we should stand up for our slelves!!

rejection.details: Please raise this issue with your council.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
